latex:
The lengths of two line segments are $ a$ units and $ b$ units respectively. Then the correct relation between them is:\\
$ \textbf{(A)}\ \frac{a+b}{2} > \sqrt{ab} \qquad\textbf{(B)}\ \frac{a+b}{2} < \sqrt{ab} \qquad\textbf{(C)}\ \frac{a+b}{2} = \sqrt{ab}\\
\textbf{(D)}\ \frac{a+b}{2} \leq \sqrt{ab} \qquad\textbf{(E)}\ \frac{a+b}{2} \geq \sqrt{ab}$
